answers.answer: GD can be managed and if managed correctly, shouldn't have many ill side effects if any at all. My mum had it for all of her pregnancies and had 5 healthy babies, even though they were big bubs (which is normal for GD)Good luck and its not as bad as they say!!

question: So as most know yesterfay i had a ruff day i was very sick went to the doc to find out i have severe kidney infection came home and was in so much pain my bf ended up calling the paramedics soon as they got here i could barely move i was very dizzy light headed etc well they started a iv on me and everything they went to check my sugars and they where only 30 so they gave me sugar before getting to the hosptial  the doctor at the hosptial believes i have gestanional diabetes i go see my regular doc in a week and pray i dnt have that :( im scared to think i do bit idk im tryimg to relax and get my mind off it sorry its so long
title: gestasional dibetes
